cast.overview: After the unexpected death of the Pope, Cardinal Lawrence is tasked with managing the covert and ancient ritual of electing a new one. Sequestered in the Vatican with the Catholic Church’s most powerful leaders until the process is complete, Lawrence finds himself at the center of a conspiracy that could lead to its downfall.
cast.title: Conclave

details.biography: Carlos Diehz is a Mexican actor. He previously worked as an architect in Vancouver until beginning his acting career in 2020. After appearing in a pair of short films in 2022, Diehz starred in Conclave (2024) as Cardinal Benitez.
details.name: Carlos Diehz
